current.banner_text_description:
Vegan & Gluten Free

With the growing demand for dairy and gluten-free on the rise, Ava's created an entire menu to accomodate those searching for the perfect dessert without sacrificing their dietary needs.
current.three_banner_bottom_description_1: Say it Sweetly with an Ava’s Cookie-Gram!  From ‘Get Well Soon’ to ‘Happy Birthday’, Ava’s Cookie-Grams arethe most unique and delicious gifts available. Cookie-Grams have 12 FreshlyBaked Sugar Cookies placed together to spell out your unique message. 100%customizable and personalized. Choose your border color, send us your message, and we willcreate your custom Cookie-Gram!
current.three_banner_bottom_description_2: Ava's 12 most popular flavors make up the Signature Sampler pack- and it won't disappoint!     Our sampler includes all-time fave's such as:  Ava's Chocolate, Banana Guava (Cupcake Wars Winner!), Apple Pie (Cupcake Wars Winner!) ,Chocolate Salted Caramel, Peanut Butter Cup, Cookies & Cream, Classic Vanilla, Red Velvet, Ava's Famous Carrot, Lemon Drop, Chocolate with Vanilla, and  Vanilla with Chocolate     All of our cupcakes are handcrafted, made fresh and shipped with care using the finest custom packaging!
current.three_banner_bottom_description_3: The hottest word of the season just met the coolest way to use it! Introducing the Sugar Selfie, a one-of-a-kind cookie designed with your candid! All you have to do is send us your images, choose your border color and we will custom design your fresh baked Vanilla Bean Sugar Selfies!

current.custom_tab_content:
In-Store Pick up & Daily Delivery Rules

Orders can be delivered or picked up at any time during our normal business hours. Orders must have a 2 hour lead time; however we are often able to accommodate shorter notice. Please call directly for rush orders/deliveries.

Minimum of 12 items for delivery. Delivery Charges apply. Large quantity/special event orders placed in advance are available for delivery throughout NJ, Eastern PA, and NYC. If we offer local delivery to your town there will be an option to choose local delivery at checkout

Cookie-Grams, Sugar Selfies, and Selfie-Grams Nationwide Shipping

Ava's Cookies are carefully packages and shipped in custom foil thermal bags to protect the delicate baked goods from the elements. All products leave Ava's kitchen in perfect condition, however, once our products leave, it is nearly impossible to regulate their handling. We have taken every possible precaution to ship our cookies with the very best care and packaging options available. Please take into consideration that slight shipping and handling blemishes may occur. 

Orders can be placed anytime, Sunday to Sunday. However, cookie sets can only be delivered Tuesday through Saturday via UPS Ground. Please plan accordingly.

All orders must be received by 11 am EST for the order to leave our bakeshop the following day. Orders received after 11 am, will not be processed until the following business day.  Example: Cookie orders placed on a Thursday by 11am, will be processed on Thursday and will leave for delivery on Friday. Orders placed on a Friday after 11am, will be processed on Monday and will ship on Tuesday.  Shipping and Arrival times vary based on the destination. Please use the UPS Ground Shipping tool for more info on your packages arrival date.

Nationwide Cupcake Shipping

Shipping Calculator from FEDEX, Overnight with 10 am Guarantee. Available in the lower 48 states.

Ava's Cupcakes are shipped with overnight delivery in custom foil thermal bags and cold packs to protect the delicate baked goods from the elements. Cupcakes are carefully placed into their custom packages and leave Ava's kitchen in perfect condition! Once our packages leave our kitchen, it is nearly impossible to regulate their handling. We have taken every possible precaution to ship our cupcakes with the very best care and packaging options available. Please take into consideration that slight shipping and handling blemishes may occur. 

Orders can be placed anytime, Sunday to Sunday. However, cupcakes can only be delivered Tuesday through Friday via FEDEX Overnight Delivery with a 10am Guarantee.  Please plan accordingly.

All orders must be received by 11 am EST for the order to leave our bakeshop the following day for overnight delivery. Orders received after 11 am, will not be processed until the following business day.  Example: Orders placed on a Thursday, will be processed on Monday for Tuesday delivery. Orders placed on a Monday before 11am, will ship on Tuesday for a Wednesday delivery.

Default.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.
